post.description:
Marks an appointment chain for reschedule.

Required parameters:
- booking_number: The unique identifier for the appointment/appointment chain
- change_reason: The reason for reschedule

get.description: Search blocker appointments with flexible filters. Omitted parameters are ignored. The endpoint always returns only appointments where status='blocker'.
Get all blocker appointments for a given date.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date to get blockers for (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

400.description: Bad Request (Missing or invalid date format)

delete.description:
Deletes blocker appointments. Provide *either* 'id' (optionally with 'del_all') *or* 'booking_number'.

- Using `id`: Deletes a specific blocker. If `del_all=true` is also provided, the entire chain of linked blockers will be deleted. Otherwise (or if `del_all=false`), only the specified blocker is deleted, and its links within any chain are updated.
- Using `booking_number`: Deletes all blockers associated with the given booking number. The `del_all` parameter is ignored in this case.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of a specific blocker to delete. Mutually exclusive with booking_number.

parameters.name: booking_number
parameters.description: Booking number to delete all associated blockers. Mutually exclusive with id.

parameters.name: del_all
parameters.description: If true and 'id' is provided, deletes the entire chain of linked blockers. Defaults to false. Ignored if 'booking_number' is used.

message.example: Successfully deleted blocker with ID 1 / Successfully deleted 5 blockers with booking_number X / Successfully deleted entire chain (3 blockers) associated with ID Y

get.description:
Return the bookable configuration time ranges per room for a given day & location.
        A range corresponds to an AppointmentTypeConfiguration belonging to the supplied location and weekday.
        Ranges inherit the *bookable* flag from their configuration record.
Retrieve a summary of the entire blocker chain belonging to the supplied blocker id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of any blocker inside the chain

id.description: ID of the first blocker in chain

get.description: Retrieve summaries of all blocker chains for a specific location.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location ID to filter blockers by

id.description: ID of the first blocker in chain

valid_from.description: Date from which this configuration is valid (YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to current date if not provided.

valid_to.description: Date until which this configuration is valid (YYYY-MM-DD). Optional, leave empty if valid indefinitely.

bookable.description: Whether this configuration can be booked. Defaults to True if not provided.

number_in_series.description: Order within a group for multi-step appointments. Defaults to 1.

intraday.description: Whether this configuration should be considered intraday.

friendly_name.description: Optional user-friendly name for this configuration.

get.description: Get appointment type configurations filtered by location

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: ID of the location to filter by

get.description: Get an appointment configuration by ID

valid_from.description: Date from which this configuration is valid (YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to current date if not provided.

valid_to.description: Date until which this configuration is valid (YYYY-MM-DD). Optional, leave empty if valid indefinitely.

bookable.description: Whether this configuration can be booked. Defaults to True if not provided.

number_in_series.description: Order within a group for multi-step appointments. Defaults to 1.

intraday.description: Whether this configuration should be considered intraday.

friendly_name.description: Optional user-friendly name for this configuration.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this email.

get.summary: Get All Non-Intern Appointment Types with Locations
get.description: Retrieves all appointment types with their details, excluding those with 'intern' status. For each appointment type, includes a list of locations where it is available. This endpoint is designed specifically for voice interfaces.

200.description: Success - Returns a list of all appointment types excluding intern types, with locations

macro_type.description: Higher-level category of the appointment type

bookable.description: Booking status: 'always' (always available) or 'patient_verified' (after patient verification)

locations.description: List of locations where this appointment type is available

phone_number.description: Contact phone number for the location

500.description: Server Error - Failed to retrieve appointment types

post.description: Book a new appointment or reschedule an existing appointment

startTime.description: The desired start time for the appointment in ISO format or other supported formats

groupId.description: The configuration group ID that defines which appointment type(s) to book

relationStatus.description: Relationship between caller and patient. Use 'self' when booking for themselves

phoneNumber.description: Patient's phone number, preferably in E.164 format (e.g., '+491234567890')

name.description: Patient's first name (required if patient not found)

surname.description: Patient's last name (required if patient not found)

dateOfBirth.description: Patient's date of birth in format YYYY-MM-DD

anamnesis.description: Medical history information or reason for visit

referralSlip.description: Whether the patient has a referral slip from another doctor

cityCode.description: City postal code for the patient's address (e.g., '10115' for Berlin)

dataValidated.description: Whether patient data has been validated during the call

fromWidget.description: Whether the booking request came from the website widget

allowContact.description: Whether the patient has consented to being contacted

sendSms.description: Whether to send SMS confirmation messages

enteredBy.description: Who created the appointment (bot, widget, staff)

bookingNumber.description: For rescheduling - original booking number to reschedule

location.description: Location ID (ignored if configuration specifies a location)

post.description: Identify a caller by their phone number

from_number.description: The caller's phone number to look up
The caller's phone number when coming from call system

nummer_bekannt.description: Whether the caller is known ('bekannt') or unknown ('unbekannt')

anrufer_nachname.description: Last name of the caller if recognized

anrufer_geburtsdatum.description: Date of birth of the caller in format YYYY-MM-DD

anrufer_vorname.description: First name of the caller if recognized

anrufer_plz.description: Postal code of the caller if available

post.description: Cancel an appointment by booking number and date of birth

bookingNumber.description: The unique booking number of the appointment to cancel

dateOfBirth.description: Patient's date of birth in format YYYY-MM-DD (for verification)

message.description: Confirmation message including number of appointments canceled

example.error: No appointments found or verification failed
No appointments found or verification failed

get.summary: Get All Practice Locations with Appointment Types
get.description: Retrieves all practice locations with their addresses, contact information, and available appointment types. This endpoint is designed specifically for voice interfaces to provide location information without room details.

200.description: Success - Returns a list of all practice locations with address information and appointment types

phone_number.description: Contact phone number for the location

appointment_types.description: List of appointment types available at this location (excluding intern types)

macro_type.description: Higher-level category of the appointment type

bookable.description: Booking status: 'always' (always available) or 'patient_verified' (after patient verification)

500.description: Server Error - Failed to retrieve locations

scheduleFor.description: The date to search for appointments (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

doctorId.description: Specific doctor ID to filter by (optional)

from_number.description: Caller's phone number for preferred doctor lookup

example.error: Internal server error: An unexpected error occurred

post.description: Verify if an appointment exists and is active (not canceled)

bookingNumber.description: The unique booking number of the appointment

dateOfBirth.description: Patient's date of birth in format YYYY-MM-DD (e.g., '1990-01-01')

This method creates a new appointment with "validating" status and sends a 
verification email. Email verification is only required for widget bookings.
